content.title: AdS/CFT Correspondence: Holography and Emergent Spacetime
content.abstract: The Anti-de Sitter/Conformal Field Theory (AdS/CFT) correspondence is a conjectured exact equivalence between a theory of quantum gravity in (d+1)-dimensional anti-de Sitter space and a conformal field theory in d dimensions without gravity. It provides the most concrete realization of the holographic principle and suggests spacetime may be emergent.

statement.text: The AdS/CFT correspondence (Maldacena 1997) conjectures that Type IIB superstring theory on AdS₅ × S⁵ is exactly equivalent to N=4 Super Yang-Mills theory in 4D. More generally, quantum gravity in (d+1)-dimensional anti-de Sitter space is dual to a conformal field theory in d dimensions. The gravitational (bulk) physics is completely encoded in the lower-dimensional (boundary) theory without gravity.
statement.interpretation: Partition functions of bulk gravity and boundary CFT are identical
statement.key_example: Type IIB string theory on AdS₅ × S⁵ ↔ N=4 SYM in 4D

explanation.intuition: Imagine a hologram: a 2D surface encodes a 3D image. AdS/CFT says something similar happens with spacetime itself! A theory of quantum gravity in the 'bulk' (interior) is exactly equivalent to a non-gravitational quantum theory living on the 'boundary' (edge). All the information about bulk physics—black holes, gravitons, spacetime geometry—is encoded in the simpler boundary theory. This means gravity might not be fundamental but 'emerges' from quantum mechanics without gravity.
explanation.key_insight: The most profound implication: gravity = thermodynamics of entanglement. The emergence of bulk spacetime from boundary data is now understood through quantum entanglement. The Ryu-Takayanagi formula says geometric quantities (area) equal information-theoretic quantities (entropy). This provides the most concrete evidence that spacetime is emergent from quantum information.
explanation.technical_details: Original conjecture (Maldacena 1997): Type IIB superstring theory on AdS₅ × S⁵ with N units of 5-form flux is dual to N=4 Super Yang-Mills in 4D with gauge group SU(N). AdS radius L and string length ℓ_s satisfy L⁴/ℓ_s⁴ = g_s N where g_s is string coupling. Limits: (1) N → ∞ (planar limit): classical strings in AdS. (2) g_s N → ∞ (strong coupling): classical supergravity. Dictionary: bulk field φ(z,x) ↔ boundary operator O(x) with Δ = d/2 + √((d/2)² + m²L²). Boundary conditions: φ(z→0) ~ z^Δ_- φ_0 + z^Δ_+ ⟨O⟩. Correlation functions: ⟨O(x₁)...O(xₙ)⟩_CFT = δⁿ S_gravity[φ]/δφ₀(x₁)...δφ₀(xₙ). Planck scale role: ℓ_P/L ≪ 1 corresponds to classical gravity; quantum corrections appear as ℓ_P/L expansion.
common_misconceptions: WRONG: 'AdS/CFT is proven' — It's a conjecture with enormous evidence but no rigorous proof
WRONG: 'AdS/CFT applies to our universe' — Our universe has positive cosmological constant (dS), not negative (AdS)
WRONG: 'The boundary theory has gravity' — The CFT is explicitly non-gravitational; gravity emerges in bulk
WRONG: 'AdS/CFT means we live in a hologram' — It's a theoretical duality, not a claim about our universe
CORRECT: 'AdS/CFT suggests spacetime can be emergent' — This is the profound conceptual implication

anti_de_sitter_space.definition: Maximally symmetric spacetime with constant negative curvature
anti_de_sitter_space.geometry: Lorentzian hyperboloid; has timelike boundary at infinity
anti_de_sitter_space.cosmological_constant: Λ < 0 (negative, unlike our universe with Λ > 0)

conformal_field_theory.definition: Quantum field theory invariant under conformal (angle-preserving) transformations
conformal_field_theory.properties: Scale invariant; no length scale; no running couplings

holographic_dictionary.definition: Map between bulk quantities and boundary quantities

ryu_takayanagi_formula.interpretation: Entanglement entropy of boundary region A equals area of minimal bulk surface γ_A

physical_predictions.description: Local bulk physics emerges from non-local boundary correlations
physical_predictions.mechanism: CFT operators at different points combine to form local bulk fields
physical_predictions.status: Understood in perturbation theory; non-perturbative understanding developing

physical_predictions.description: Black holes in AdS correspond to thermal states in CFT
physical_predictions.calculation: Hawking-Page transition = deconfinement transition in CFT
physical_predictions.status: Well-established; one of earliest confirmations of AdS/CFT

physical_predictions.description: Bulk spatial geometry is dual to boundary entanglement structure
physical_predictions.status: Strong evidence; drives modern quantum gravity research

physical_predictions.description: η/s ≥ ℏ/(4πk_B) for strongly coupled systems
physical_predictions.application: Applied to quark-gluon plasma in heavy ion collisions

implications_for_planck_scale.emergent_spacetime: Bulk spacetime (including Planck-scale physics) emerges from boundary CFT
implications_for_planck_scale.no_fundamental_gravity: Gravity is not fundamental but emergent from entanglement
implications_for_planck_scale.planck_length_meaning: ℓ_P in bulk corresponds to strong coupling in boundary theory
implications_for_planck_scale.black_hole_information: Information is preserved in boundary CFT; resolves paradox in AdS

evidence_for_correspondence.description: SO(4,2) isometry of AdS₅ = Conformal group in 4D
3-point functions computed in both theories agree exactly
Conformal anomaly c = N² agrees on both sides
Spectrum of operator dimensions matches string spectrum exactly
evidence_for_correspondence.strength: Extremely strong; infinite number of checks

evidence_for_correspondence.description: Black hole entropy matches CFT thermal entropy

open_questions: Does a dS/CFT (for positive cosmological constant) exist?
How does the bulk emerge from the boundary microscopically?
What is the role of quantum error correction in holography?
Can we use holography to solve QCD?

definitions_glossary.ads_cft_correspondence: Conjectured exact equivalence between gravity in anti-de Sitter space and conformal field theory on its boundary
definitions_glossary.anti_de_sitter_space: Maximally symmetric spacetime with constant negative curvature and cosmological constant Λ < 0
definitions_glossary.conformal_field_theory: Quantum field theory invariant under conformal (angle-preserving) transformations
definitions_glossary.holographic_dictionary: Set of rules mapping bulk gravitational quantities to boundary CFT quantities
definitions_glossary.ryu_takayanagi: S_A = Area(γ_A)/4G_N, relating entanglement entropy to geometric area
definitions_glossary.boundary: d-dimensional edge of AdS where CFT lives
definitions_glossary.emergent_spacetime: Concept that spacetime geometry arises from more fundamental quantum information
